name: SimpleGameMaker
description:
Our program will allow you to create your own games and levels, to share them with friends or if you are lazy, just to pass the levels already made for you.

This tool made to open your creativity so you can create hard, interesting, surprising levels and let your friends pass them.

The one's who made really interesting and attracting worlds can contact with me in the comments so we will think about adding YOUR OWN designed level to the file with our program that will be given to the new users.

Enjoy :)
